channel.title: mahasi on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha
channel.description: Recent content in mahasi on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha

item.title: General Update Pre-Vassa 2017
item.description: Update Aug 5: I am back at Varansi Monastery , Mingaladone as pictured. This is a general update. There are many sublinks to look at. Enjoy! I have passed all of my exams and finished my Diploma Course at ITBMU and have elected not to continue further. I wish to do meditation and if I study, want to focus on Pali and the memorization of the 45 page Patimokkha rules in Pali.
